metadata.title: CVE-2023-49086 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti is a robust performance and fault management framework and a frontendto RRDTool - a Time Series Database (TSDB). A vulnerability in versionsprior to 1.2.27 bypasses an earlier fix for CVE-2023-39360, thereforeleading to a DOM XSS attack. Exploitation of the vulnerability is possiblefor an authorized user. The vulnerable component is the `graphs_new.php`.The impact of the vulnerability is execution of arbitrary JavaScript codein the attacked user's browser. This issue has been patched in version1.2.27.

criterions.comment: cacti package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
